newsitem.title: ITALY: Thugs attack tapirs at Rome zoo.
newsitem.headline: Thugs attack tapirs at Rome zoo.

text.p: Vandals wielding metal bars badly injured tapirs at Rome zoo, forcing vets to destroy one of the large mammals, the zoo director said on Tuesday.
Claudio Manicastri said unknown assailants broke into the zoo on Saturday night and again on Sunday.

In the first attack, they hurled rocks at the large-nosed animals, wounding one creature badly on the head. The following night they climbed into the pen and attacked a young tapir, breaking one of its legs.
The animal had to be put down.
"You wouldn't catch these cowards climbing into the lion or bear pens. Instead they picked on one of the most docile animals there are," Manicastri said.
